author: davidb
msg: Added parent poms and a root pom to the Aries project.

The poms are based on the parent poms from the Geronimo project where I tried to strike a balance between leaving enough useful stuff in without dragging too much baggage across. This is just a starting point anyway, so feel free to modify.
Now you can build Aries from the trunk directory by simply doing mvn install there...
Changed the parent pom of the Blueprint module to use the Aries one, like this:
